snippet: An unprecedented continental-scale war game was intended to determine how prepared the nation is for a cyberattack against electric systems.
abstract: Nearly 10,000 electrical engineers, cybersecurity specialists, utility executives and FBI agents take part in unprecedented war game intended to determine how prepared the nation is for a cyberattack against electric systems.
lead_paragraph: An unprecedented continental-scale war game was intended to determine how prepared the nation is for a cyberattack against electric systems.

headline.main: Attack Ravages Power Grid. (Just a Test.)
headline.print_headline: Attack Ravages Power Grid. (Just a Test.)
